results.title: Renoprotective effects of empagliflozin in type 1 and type 2 models of diabetic nephropathy superimposed with hypertension.
results.text_hl: Blood @DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@renal hypertrophy@@@ were also reduced in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_empagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C570240 @@@empagliflozin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Williams JM, Murphy SR, Wu W, Border JJ, Fan F, Roman RJ. Renoprotective effects of empagliflozin in type 1 and type 2 models of diabetic nephropathy superimposed with hypertension. Geroscience. 2022 Dec;44(6):2845-2861. PMID: 35767209
citations.BibTeX: @article{35767209, title={Renoprotective effects of empagliflozin in type 1 and type 2 models of diabetic nephropathy superimposed with hypertension.}, author={Williams JM and Murphy SR and Wu W and Border JJ and Fan F and Roman RJ}, journal={Geroscience}, volume={44}, number={6}, pages={2845-2861}}

results.title: Differential Effects of Prevention and Reversal Treatment with Lisinopril on Left Ventricular Remodelling in a Rat Model of Heart Failure.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: Angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitors such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, represent the front line pharmacological treatment for @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@, which is characterised by marked @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated_with_Left_Ventricular_Noncompaction @DISEASE_MESH:C565277 @@@left ventricular (LV) dilatation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Brower GL, Levick SP, Janicki JS. Differential Effects of Prevention and Reversal Treatment with Lisinopril on Left Ventricular Remodelling in a Rat Model of Heart Failure. Heart Lung Circ. 2015 Sep;24(9):919-24. PMID: 25837018
citations.BibTeX: @article{25837018, title={Differential Effects of Prevention and Reversal Treatment with Lisinopril on Left Ventricular Remodelling in a Rat Model of Heart Failure.}, author={Brower GL and Levick SP and Janicki JS}, journal={Heart Lung Circ}, volume={24}, number={9}, pages={919-24}}

results.title: Effects of lisinopril on experimental ischemia in rats. Influence of infarct size.
results.text_hl: The protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on heart function and on the degree of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@ could only be detected in small @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarcts@@@

citations.NLM: Zornoff LA, Matsubara BB, Matsubara LS, Paiva SA, Tornero MT, Spadaro J. Effects of lisinopril on experimental ischemia in rats. Influence of infarct size. Arq Bras Cardiol. 1999 Oct;73(4):359-72. PMID: 10754590
citations.BibTeX: @article{10754590, title={Effects of lisinopril on experimental ischemia in rats. Influence of infarct size.}, author={Zornoff LA and Matsubara BB and Matsubara LS and Paiva SA and Tornero MT and Spadaro J}, journal={Arq Bras Cardiol}, volume={73}, number={4}, pages={359-72}}

results.title: [The efficacy of lysinopril (and/or its combination with hydrochlorothiazide) in patients with essential hypertension].
results.text_hl: It is concluded that long-term monotherapy or combined therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lysinopril@@@ stabilizes the disturbed diurnal AP profile, decreases variability and morning rises of AP, normalizes vegetative regulation of heart rhythms, and promotes regression of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@myocardial hypertrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Kakhramanova SM. [The efficacy of lysinopril (and/or its combination with hydrochlorothiazide) in patients with essential hypertension]. Klin Med (Mosk). 2012;90(4):35-8. PMID: 22896978
citations.BibTeX: @article{22896978, title={[The efficacy of lysinopril (and/or its combination with hydrochlorothiazide) in patients with essential hypertension].}, author={Kakhramanova SM}, journal={Klin Med (Mosk)}, volume={90}, number={4}, pages={35-8}}

results.title: [Effect of lisinopril on cardiac parameters and mortality after myocardial infarction in rats].
results.text_hl: [Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on cardiac parameters and mortality after @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@].

citations.NLM: Zornoff LA, Paiva SA, Matsubara BB, Matsubara LS, Tucci PJ, Spadaro J. [Effect of lisinopril on cardiac parameters and mortality after myocardial infarction in rats]. Arq Bras Cardiol. 1997 Mar;68(3):175-9. PMID: 9435355

results.title: [The effect of lisinopril and amlodipine treatment on left ventricular hypertrophy in hypertensive patients].
results.text_hl: UNLABELLED: The aim of the study is an echocardiographic assessment of the influence of a long-term @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ treatment in combination with @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@LV hypertrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Arslanagić A, Bajraktarević A. [The effect of lisinopril and amlodipine treatment on left ventricular hypertrophy in hypertensive patients]. Med Arh. 2006;60(6 Suppl 2):71-3. PMID: 18172987

results.title: Changes in collagen phenotypes during progression and regression of cardiac hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: We also studied the changes in collagen after regression of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@, with antihypertensive therapy with ACE inhibitors, @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@ (C) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (L).

citations.NLM: Yang CM, Kandaswamy V, Young D, Sen S. Changes in collagen phenotypes during progression and regression of cardiac hypertrophy. Cardiovasc Res. 1997 Nov;36(2):236-45. PMID: 9463635
citations.BibTeX: @article{9463635, title={Changes in collagen phenotypes during progression and regression of cardiac hypertrophy.}, author={Yang CM and Kandaswamy V and Young D and Sen S}, journal={Cardiovasc Res}, volume={36}, number={2}, pages={236-45}}

results.title: Inhibition of matrix metalloproteinase activity by ACE inhibitors prevents left ventricular remodeling in a rat model of heart failure.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol
results.text_hl: Long-term in vivo administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ also prevented @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated_with_Left_Ventricular_Noncompaction @DISEASE_MESH:C565277 @@@LV dilatation@@@, attenuated @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@myocardial hypertrophy@@@, and prevented changes in myocardial compliance and contractility.

citations.NLM: Brower GL, Levick SP, Janicki JS. Inhibition of matrix metalloproteinase activity by ACE inhibitors prevents left ventricular remodeling in a rat model of heart failure. Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol. 2007 Jun;292(6):H3057-64. PMID: 17308006
citations.BibTeX: @article{17308006, title={Inhibition of matrix metalloproteinase activity by ACE inhibitors prevents left ventricular remodeling in a rat model of heart failure.}, author={Brower GL and Levick SP and Janicki JS}, journal={Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol}, volume={292}, number={6}, pages={H3057-64}}

results.title: Protein synthesis during regression of left ventricular hypertrophy with lisinopril in abdominal aortic constriction model of hypertension.
results.text_hl: The results indicate that regression of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@pressure overloaded hypertrophy@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ primarily occurs by a decrease in protein synthesis in the connective tissue components of the left ventricle, although cytoskeletal components may be unaffected.

citations.NLM: Siddiq T, Richardson PJ, Trotter SE, Preedy VR. Protein synthesis during regression of left ventricular hypertrophy with lisinopril in abdominal aortic constriction model of hypertension. Biochem Mol Med. 1996 Feb;57(1):19-24. PMID: 8812722
citations.BibTeX: @article{8812722, title={Protein synthesis during regression of left ventricular hypertrophy with lisinopril in abdominal aortic constriction model of hypertension.}, author={Siddiq T and Richardson PJ and Trotter SE and Preedy VR}, journal={Biochem Mol Med}, volume={57}, number={1}, pages={19-24}}

results.title: [Evaluation of long-term therapy influence with angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril on morphofunctional parameters of the left ventricle, peripheral artery endothelium disfunction and painless myocardial ischemia in premenopausal women with hypertension].
results.text_hl: The results show that @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ therapy in premenopausal @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ can stop or even cause regression of @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Left_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017379 @@@LV myocardial hypertrophy@@@ and produce favorable effect on @DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@LV remodeling@@@ mostly in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with concentric type of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@ and/or without @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@, and has positive effect on frequency of painless @DISEASE_Myocardial_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017202 @@@myocardial ischemia@@@ events.

citations.NLM: Khabibulina MM. [Evaluation of long-term therapy influence with angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril on morphofunctional parameters of the left ventricle, peripheral artery endothelium disfunction and painless myocardial ischemia in premenopausal women with hypertension]. Kardiologiia. 2010;50(1):16-21. PMID: 20144153
citations.BibTeX: @article{20144153, title={[Evaluation of long-term therapy influence with angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor lisinopril on morphofunctional parameters of the left ventricle, peripheral artery endothelium disfunction and painless myocardial ischemia in premenopausal women with hypertension].}, author={Khabibulina MM}, journal={Kardiologiia}, volume={50}, number={1}, pages={16-21}}
